GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.19 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
jbd2: fix assertion 'jh->b_frozen_data == NULL' failure when journal aborted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit ddd896792e1718cb84c96f3e618270589b6886dc, it was introduced in version v2.6.19 by commit 470decc613ab2048b619a01028072d932d9086ee. For more details please see the references link.
